name: Find Game Hidden Differences
description:
The Find Game Hidden Differences a type of the Puzzle games
where two versions of the same picture are shown side by side, and the player has to find all differences between them

How to play:

5 differences between the two pictures and click on the difference.
- Find 5 Differences spots between two photo
- Competition with time
Be careful: tapping a wrong spot will give you a time penalty.

Can you find all of them?
Train your brain in this fun puzzle game!

Download now for free.
